content.prompt: Scholars believe that the design of the Silla gold and jade crown suggests the form of a

choices.label: sacred tree in the royal precinct

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.4: Theories and Interpretations of South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
